item.title: 阿布扎比不惧油价暴跌，继续在国内大兴土木
item.description: 在过去的几年里，阿布扎比将石油收入用于建造各种建筑，从华丽的博物馆到新的办公大楼，以及大量金融公司的涌入。尽管最近油价下滑，但阿布扎比的发展步伐仍将继续。【原文：Abu Dhabi has spent the past few years funneling oil revenue into building everything from splashy museums to new office towers amid an influx of financial firms. The pace of development is likely to keep up despite a recent slump in oil prices.】

item.title: 德意志银行发现更多中国客户撤出美国资产
item.description: 据德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）称，随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税大潮助长了美国资产的外流，中国客户已经减持了部分国债，转而持有欧债。【原文：Chinese clients have reduced some of their Treasuries holdings in favor of European debt as President Donald Trump’s tariff deluge fuels an exodus from US assets, according to Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: 即使在特朗普加征关税之前，马来西亚经济增长仍不及预期
item.description: 在美国宣布惩罚性关税计划之前，马来西亚第一季度的经济增长速度就低于预期，受制造业和建筑业增长疲软的拖累。【原文：Malaysia’s economy expanded at a slower-than-expected pace in the first quarter, dragged down by weaker growth in manufacturing and construction even before the US announced plans for punishing tariffs.】

item.title: 韩国大选、关税避风港押注，Netflix Darling 股票上涨
item.description: 在韩国总统候选人承诺加大对文化出口的支持力度并为文化产业提供政府激励措施之后，韩国娱乐业股票周五上涨。【原文：South Korean entertainment stocks rose Friday after the nation’s presidential front-runner pledged greater support for cultural exports and government incentives for the industry.】

item.title: 印尼称寻求在 60 天内完成美国贸易谈判
item.description: 印尼经济统筹部长艾尔朗加-哈塔托（Airlangga Hartarto）表示，印尼和美国同意争取在60天内完成贸易和投资伙伴关系谈判，因为东南亚国家正努力避免对世界最大经济体出口产品征收更高的关税。【原文：Indonesia and the US agreed to try to complete negotiations on trade and investment partnerships in 60 days, Coordinating Economic Minister Airlangga Hartarto said, as the Southeast Asian nation seeks to avert higher tariffs on its exports to the world’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 马自达暂停在美国生产运往加拿大的 CX-50 汽车
item.description: 马自达汽车公司发言人周五表示，该公司将暂停向加拿大出口其在美国生产的一款车型，以此作为应对唐纳德-特朗普总统关税的临时措施。【原文：Mazda Motor Corp. will pause exporting one model type to Canada that it makes in the US as a temporary countermeasure to President Donald Trump’s tariffs, a spokesperson said Friday.】

item.title: 日本大型人寿保险公司将大举投资国内超长期债券
item.description: 在日本超长期国债收益率飙升之后，Fukoku Mutual Life Insurance Co.【原文：Fukoku Mutual Life Insurance Co. plans to invest in Japan’s super-long government bonds this fiscal year after their yields skyrocketed, and is considering shifting from foreign debt.】

item.title: 谷歌两次成为垄断者。修复它将是困难的部分
item.description: Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司在不到一年的时间里被两名联邦法官认定非法垄断了互联网的关键部分。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google has been found by two federal judges, in less than a year, to have illegally monopolized critical parts of the internet.】

item.title: 韩国考虑将用于干预的外汇债券增加一倍至 35 亿美元
item.description: 韩国计划将可用于资助货币市场活动的海外债券发行量增加一倍以上，达到 35 亿美元，韩国官员称这是应对剧烈波动的需要。【原文：South Korea plans to more than double the amount of overseas bonds it can issue to fund currency market activity to $3.5 billion, with officials citing the need to respond to sharp fluctuations.】

item.title: 尽管中国太阳能电池制造商誓言削减产量，但产量仍创下历史新高
item.description: 中国太阳能电池产量在 3 月份飙升至创纪录水平，原因是政策驱动的抢装潮刺激了供应链上的需求，而这一发展与该行业抑制产量的誓言背道而驰。【原文：China’s solar cell output soared to a record in March as policy-driven, rush installations boosted demand along the supply chain, a development that goes against the sector’s vows to curb output.】

item.title: 日本市政债券交易因利率波动激增而滞销
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，日本地方政府最近几次发行债券都未能售罄，这标志着传统上稳定的市场发生了变化。【原文：Japan’s local governments have failed to sell out bonds at several recent offerings, marking a shift in what has traditionally been a stable market, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本金融服务管理局称受黑客攻击的在线交易额约达 7 亿美元
item.description: 日本金融监管机构表示，随着网络钓鱼诈骗在该国激增，自 2 月份以来，日本经纪商已报告了至少 1454 起黑客交易案例，价值近 1,000 亿日元（约合 7 亿美元）。【原文：Japanese brokerages have reported at least 1,454 cases of hacked trading worth almost ¥100 billion ($700 million) since February, as phishing scams soar in the country, the nation’s financial regulator said.】

item.title: 中国股市最后一刻反弹显示国家暗中操纵
item.description: 本周，随着与美国贸易紧张局势的升级，中国主权财富基金似乎已出手支撑股市。【原文：China’s sovereign wealth fund appears to have stepped in to shore up stocks this week as escalating trade tensions with the US rattle investors.】

item.title: 日本通胀加速，大米价格创 50 年来最大涨幅
item.description: 在美国关税措施给经济前景蒙上阴影之前，日本上个月的消费者通胀率迅速上升，支持了央行逐步加息的立场。【原文：Japan’s consumer inflation advanced apace last month, supporting the central bank’s stance on a gradual rate hike path before US tariff measures clouded the economic outlook.】

item.title: 在贸易战不断扩大的背景下，特朗普对中国船只采取征税措施
item.description: 特朗普政府采取措施对停靠美国港口的中国船只征税，有可能撼动全球航运路线，并使世界两大经济体之间的贸易战升级。【原文：The Trump administration took steps to impose levies on Chinese vessels docking at US ports, threatening to shake up global shipping routes and escalate the trade war between the world’s two biggest economies.】

item.title: 中美贸易战谁会先眨眼？
item.description:
唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统和习近平主席正在进行一场高风险的 "吃鸡 "游戏。在今天的 "Big Take "播客中，我们将探讨如何才能让他们坐到谈判桌前？【原文：

item.title: 由于美联储令人失望，亚洲股市开盘后走势低迷：市场综述
item.description: 在美国股市录得一周跌幅之后，亚洲股市周五谨慎开盘，因为市场对杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）回击美联储支持市场的观点感到失望。【原文：Asian stocks looked set for a cautious open Friday after US equities posted a weekly loss amid disappointment over Jerome Powell’s pushback on the idea of the Federal Reserve supporting markets.】

item.title: DraftKings 撤回将为预测市场提供切入点的申请
item.description: 博彩公司 DraftKings Inc. 撤回了销售衍生产品的许可申请，这表明博彩业对预测市场的兴起还在犹豫不决。【原文：Bookmaker DraftKings Inc. has withdrawn an application for a license to sell derivatives in a sign of the gambling industry’s hesitant approach to the rise of prediction markets.】

item.title: 优步洽谈收购土耳其外卖平台 Trendyol Go
item.description: 据知情人士透露，优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is in talks to acquire Turkish food delivery platform Trendyol Go, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美联储公布美国大型银行压力测试改革计划
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）正在完善对大银行压力测试的改革计划，并提交了一份两年内平均测试结果的提案，以征求公众意见。【原文：The US Federal Reserve is solidifying plans to overhaul its stress tests of big banks, presenting a proposal for public comment that would average the results over two years.】

item.title: 上周美国联邦雇员申请失业救济人数略有上升
item.description: 联邦雇员新提交的失业救济申请连续第二周增加，徘徊在一月份特朗普政府开始解雇各机构工作人员之前的水平附近。【原文：New applications for unemployment benefits filed by federal employees increased for a second week, hovering near levels seen in January before the Trump administration started to fire workers across agencies.】

item.title: 玻利维亚违约风险上升，穆迪将其评级进一步降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 周四，穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将玻利维亚的信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级，原因是国际收支危机加深，主权违约风险增加。【原文：Bolivia’s credit score was lowered further into junk by Moody’s Ratings Thursday on a deepening balance of payments crisis and increased sovereign default risk.】

item.title: 全球贸易战升温，穆迪上调违约预测
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）提高了对今年违约情况的预测，因为全球贸易战的升级越来越有可能拖累经济增长，并使融资变得更加困难。【原文：Moody’s Ratings is boosting its forecast for defaults this year as escalating trade wars globally are increasingly likely to weigh on economic growth and make financing harder to get.】

item.title: 曾经炙手可热的华尔街基金迅速解体，看不到救星
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）本周排除了救援任务，招致唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的愤怒，华尔街急需救命稻草，因为受关税影响的市场再次下滑。【原文：With Jerome Powell ruling out a rescue mission this week and incurring the wrath of Donald Trump, Wall Street is desperate for a lifeline as tariff-lashed markets slide anew.】

item.title: 赫兹寻求举借更多债务以增加资产负债表上的现金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，赫兹全球控股公司（Hertz Global Holdings Inc.【原文：Hertz Global Holdings Inc. is exploring ways to raise debt to bolster its balance sheet as it faces a potential payout to bondholders and to address looming liabilities, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 关税现实影响 "美国制造 "诉求，Snap-on 下跌
item.description: 工具制造商 Snap-on 公司因关税导致的销售下滑而蒙上阴影，创下一年多来的最大跌幅。【原文：Toolmaker Snap-on Inc. fell the most in more than a year after its made-in-America messaging was overshadowed by a tariff-driven sales slump, illustrating how even firms with diversified supply chains are being hurt by proposed levies.】

item.title: Roblox 和 Discord 因儿童安全问题受到各州审查
item.description: 佛罗里达州和新泽西州的官员正在仔细检查流行的视频游戏应用程序 Roblox 和 Discord，以解决儿童安全问题。【原文：Officials in Florida and New Jersey are scrutinizing popular video game apps Roblox and Discord over child safety concerns.】

item.title: 阿克曼称潘兴已持有赫兹 19.8% 的股份
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场资本管理公司（Pershing Square Capital Management）已在租车公司赫兹全球控股公司（Hertz Global Holdings Inc.【原文：Bill Ackman’s Pershing Square Capital Management has amassed a nearly 20% stake in rental car company Hertz Global Holdings Inc., the billionaire said in a social media post.】

item.title: Generali 投资公司与合作伙伴共同发起信用二级市场基金
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，资产管理公司 Generali Investments Holding SpA 和投资公司 Partners Group 将联手推出私人信贷二级市场基金。【原文：Asset manager Generali Investments Holding SpA and investment firm Partners Group are teaming up to launch a private credit secondaries fund, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 特朗普提出解雇鲍威尔，对美联储主席的敌意爆发
item.description: 本周，唐纳德-特朗普总统与杰罗姆-鲍威尔的长期积怨达到了白热化的程度，总统公开酝酿因美联储主席的利率决定而将其解职，而一些顾问则建议他保持克制。【原文：President Donald Trump’s long-running ire with Jerome Powell reached a fever pitch this week, with the president openly musing about dismissing the Fed chair over his interest-rate decisions as some advisers have been counseling restraint.】
